title: Future Business Climate; Diffusion Index for FRB - New York District
notes: Future Business Climate reports the likely direction of business climate for the service sector over the six months ahead for the state of New York, Northern New Jersey, and Fairfield County, Connecticut. For more information regarding the Business Leaders Survey release from the Federal Reserve Bank of New York visit: http://www.newyorkfed.org/survey/business_leaders/bls_overview.html.
